channel.title: Rsps-pk 2015 pk server
channel.description:
RSPS-PK is a 2015 pk server! [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/2dv4h9u.png[/img] Website: [url=http://www.rspspk.com/forums/]http://www.rspspk.com/forums/[/url]
Recent Updates:
[ol][li]Ignore list works now, the ignored person won't be able to talk, pm, duel or trade you.[/li] [li]The attack option won't be first if the person is in your clan or you are in a fight in non-multi and the person hovered isn't the person you are attacking.[/li] [li]Caching chat message, clan and friends data so client will use less CPU[/li] [li]Clan members/purple dots will now update no matter what, first you had to be at the clanchat tab due to performance issues but because of a new system I wrote this won't be a bottleneck anymore.[/li] [li]Redone the magic formula and special on 'tanks' (like you guys call it)[/li] [li]Fixed some items prices so the items kept on death order is more logical[/li] [li]Client settings now save on logout[/li] [li]Added 3 different menu styles[/li] [li]If you turn off your private chat you won't see your green dots anymore(handy in wars)[/li] [li]Attack option prioritized[/li] [li]Redone all combat formulas, buffed magic, nerfed range and redone protection prayers.[/li][/ol]
[spoiler] [IMG]http://i58.tinypic.com/dqgmef.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2yxgdhj.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/731pgk.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/wjxh5k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/15sa72x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2wrp0gl.png[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/5mis7d.png[/img] [/spoiler] There is so much more to this server, but i'm going to let you come and join, so you can find out!
Other Features:
[ul][li]Black Jack[/li] [li]Wilderness Monsters Drop Useful Items![/li] [li]Fully Working Slayer ( monsters are in the wildy! )[/li] [li]hybrids/rangers/melee/pure - every category has someone![/li] [li]Edgeville pk - ::hybrid ( pk area )[/li] [li]Gear sets - simply click the button![/li] [li]save/load a gear set![/li] [li]VOID WORKS!!![/li] [li]::setlevel command![/li] [li]Working highscores - elo/kdr/ks/bounty![/li] [li]Wonderful Switching Useful for hybrids![/li] [li]The eco is all about pk points! ( tickets )[/li] [li]100's of players to play and compete against![/li] [li]Events Every Day! The Rewards For Winning Are Astonishing![/li][/ul]
Video: [url=http://youtu.be/jCIcIXBEA2g]http://youtu.be/jCIcIXBEA2g[/url]
[/quote]

item.title: Rsps-pk 2015 pk server

@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

~bump~
New Updates:

PK is improved - new client v1.18 is now the client version - join now and make new friends - another update soon!

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps-pk 2015 pk server
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Well in terms of the donator shop, I was looking at the store page and I find it a bit ridiculous on what’s provided in the shop, don’t you think? Either or, I never understood the reason for making donator (or regular donator - whichever in this case) 10 dollars, it’s like a global amount for every RSPS I’ve seen online - it’s weird, and I find that to be a little overpriced.

Read full topic

item.title: Rsps-pk 2015 pk server
item.dc:creator: @GfServerMaker1 GfServerMaker1
item.description:
@GfServerMaker1 wrote:

RSPS-PK is a 2015 pk server!

Website: http://www.rspspk.com/forums/

Recent Updates:

[ol][li]Ignore list works now, the ignored person won’t be able to talk, pm, duel or trade you.[/li]
[li]The attack option won’t be first if the person is in your clan or you are in a fight in non-multi and the person hovered isn’t the person you are attacking.[/li]
[li]Caching chat message, clan and friends data so client will use less CPU[/li]
[li]Clan members/purple dots will now update no matter what, first you had to be at the clanchat tab due to performance issues but because of a new system I wrote this won’t be a bottleneck anymore.[/li]
[li]Redone the magic formula and special on ‘tanks’ (like you guys call it)[/li]
[li]Fixed some items prices so the items kept on death order is more logical[/li]
[li]Client settings now save on logout[/li]
[li]Added 3 different menu styles[/li]
[li]If you turn off your private chat you won’t see your green dots anymore(handy in wars)[/li]
[li]Attack option prioritized[/li]
[li]Redone all combat formulas, buffed magic, nerfed range and redone protection prayers.[/li][/ol]

[spoiler]







[/spoiler]
There is so much more to this server, but i’m going to let you come and join, so you can find out!

Other Features:

[ul][li]Black Jack[/li]
[li]Wilderness Monsters Drop Useful Items![/li]
[li]Fully Working Slayer ( monsters are in the wildy! )[/li]
[li]hybrids/rangers/melee/pure - every category has someone![/li]
[li]Edgeville pk - ::hybrid ( pk area )[/li]
[li]Gear sets - simply click the button![/li]
[li]save/load a gear set![/li]
[li]VOID WORKS!!![/li]
[li]::setlevel command![/li]
[li]Working highscores - elo/kdr/ks/bounty![/li]
[li]Wonderful Switching Useful for hybrids![/li]
[li]The eco is all about pk points! ( tickets )[/li]
[li]100’s of players to play and compete against![/li]
[li]Events Every Day! The Rewards For Winning Are Astonishing![/li][/ul]

Video:
http://youtu.be/jCIcIXBEA2g

[/quote]

Read full topic
